japanese: みんな、お昼ご飯できたよー！
translation: Everyone, food's ready!

japanese:
うおお？
これは……。
translation:
Woahhh?
This is...

japanese:
すっごーい！
ご馳走ですね、一体どうしたんですか？
translation:
Amaaazing!
What a fantastic meal! What's going on here?

japanese:
美味しそ～！
これは、気をつけないと食べすぎちゃうよ。
translation:
It looks so good!
If I'm not careful, I'm gonna eat too much.

japanese: はわわぁ……！
translation: Woooa!

japanese: 五月、よだれ出そうだよ。
translation: Itsuki, you're about to drool.

japanese:
はっ！？
し、失礼しました、はしたないところを！
translation:
HUH?!
Sorry guys! Wasn't on purpose!

japanese:
でも、本当に豪華ですね。
らいはちゃん１人でここまで？
translation:
But it really is a gorgeous meal, isn't it.
Did you make all of this by yourself, Raiha-chan?

japanese:
ううん、二乃さんが手伝ってくれたの。
だからいつもより手の込んだものが、
たくさん作れたんだ。
translation:
No, Nino-san helped me.
We were able to prepare a much more elaborate meal.

japanese: 二乃が？
translation: Nino helped you?

japanese:
なんとなく手伝いたい気分だったのよ。
特に意味はないわ。
translation:
I just kind of felt like helping out.
I have no ulterior motive, you know.

japanese: ふうん、意味はないんだ。
translation: Hmmm, no ulterior motive, eh.

japanese: ええ、ないわよ？
translation: Yes, there really isn't, okay?

japanese:
それはそうと、みんな海で遊んでお腹空いたでしょ？
たくさん用意してあるから、たっぷり召し上がれ。
translation:
Well, everyone is hungry after playing at the beach, 
right? We've prepared a lot of food! Now, please 
help yourself.

japanese: はい、遠慮なくいただきます！
translation: Alright, I won't hold back! Thanks for the meal!

japanese: あんたはちょっとセーブしなさい。
translation: Now you go easy on it, okay?

japanese: そんなっ！？
translation: Why would you say that?!

japanese:
いや、いくら五月ちゃんでも、
これを食べ尽くすのはさすがにないでしょ。
translation: There's no way that Itsuki-chan could eat all of this.

japanese:
ねえ、フー君はまず何を食べる？
取ってあげるわ。
translation:
Hey, Fu-kun, what are you going to eat first?
I'll get it for you.

japanese: ああ、いや、自分で取る。
translation: Nah, it's fine, I'll get it myself.

japanese:
そう？
遠慮しなくてもいいのに。
translation:
Really?
You don't need to be shy at all, you know.

japanese:
あ、これなんてお勧めよ？
味付けがすごくうまくいったの。
translation:
Oh, I really recommend this! Wanna try?
It's perfectly flavoured.

japanese: へえ、じゃあ食べてみるか。
translation: Really, then I'll give it a shot.

japanese: ……どう？
translation: ...How is it?

japanese: うん、美味いぞ。
translation: Yeah, it's good.

japanese:
なんだ？
そんなに心配そうな顔をしなくても、
本当に美味いって。
translation:
What?
Don't worry about it. It was really good.

japanese: ねー、やっぱり二乃の料理は美味しいよね。
translation: Yeah, Nino, your cooking is fantastic.

japanese:
しかも、ちゃんと栄養バランスまで
考えてくれるんだから、ホント助かっちゃう。
translation:
You also think about nutritional balance,
which is such a big help.

japanese:
もちろんカロリーもね。
どこかのズボラな女優のために。
translation:
I'm taking calories into account as well.
Especially for a certain unkempt actress.

japanese: あはは、ありがとうございまーす。
translation: Ahaha, thank you.

japanese:
上杉さんも、二乃にご飯の管理をしてもらえば
バッチリ健康になれますよ？
translation:
Uesugi-san, if you let Nino take care of your meals,
you will be perfectly healthy, you know?

japanese:
なに言ってんだ。
毎日、お前たちのとこで
飯を食うわけにはいかないだろ。
translation:
What are you saying?
There's no way I could take my meals
at your house every day.

japanese: あ、私は、別にいいけど？
translation: Ah, well, I don't mind, you know?

japanese:
俺がよくないんだよ。
そんな、たかってるみたいなことできるか。
translation:
I'm not going to do that you know.
There's no way I'm pestering you for a meal everyday.

japanese:
あと、俺は今でも健康だ。
らいはがきっちり食事を管理してくれてるからな。
translation:
And I'm healthy enough.
Raiha takes proper care of my meals.

japanese:
お兄ちゃんは食べ盛りだからね。
ちゃんと考えてるよ。
translation:
Big bro's a growing boy, and he's got a huge appetite.
I prepare every meal with the greatest care.

japanese:
妹にここまで言わせるのは、
兄としていかがなものかと思いますよ？
translation:
How is it possible that your younger sister is taking so 
much care of her big brother?

japanese:
お前もな。
姉の二乃に、ちゃんと感謝しろ。
translation:
You're in the same boat.
Make sure to thank your big sister, Nino.

japanese: ……二乃、いつも本当にありがとうございます。
translation: ...Nino, thank you very much.

japanese:
はいはい。
まあ、ここにいた間は
あんたも頑張ってたと思うわよ？
translation:
It's fine, it's fine.
Well, I really think you did your best
while we were here, you know?

japanese:
ですが、やはり二乃にはかないません。
島という、あらゆるものが限られた場所で、
こんな料理を作れてしまうんですから。
translation:
But I'm still no match for you, Nino.
You can cook this kind of food on a remote island with 
such limited resources.

japanese:
まあ、確かに。
けど俺には、らいはの作る食事のほうが
合ってるかな。
translation:
Well, no doubt you're a good cook.
But I think the meals Raiha is cooking for me are still 
better.

japanese: えっ……。
translation: Eh...

japanese: 上杉君。
translation: Uesugi-kun.

japanese: あまり感心しない言い方だね。
translation: Speaking with Nino like that was very rude.

japanese:
そうだよ、お兄ちゃん。
今のは二乃さんに失礼だよ。
translation:
That's right, big bro,
That, just now, was rude to Nino-san.

japanese:
あっ！　いや！
ちょっと待て、誤解だ！
translation:
Oh! No!
Hold on, it's a misunderstanding!

japanese: 誤解しようがなかったと思うけど。
translation: It didn't seem like a misunderstanding.

japanese:
二乃の料理は美味いぞ。
ただ、その……量が多いというか豪華すぎる。
そこが気になって、つい口に出ちまったんだ。
translation:
Nino's cooking is delicious. However...
it's like there's too much food, and it's too luxurious.
I blabbered it out without thinking about it, I guess.

japanese:
どうしてよ。
美味しいものをたくさん食べてほしいって
考えたらいけないわけ？
translation:
Why?
Is it a bad thing to provide you with the best food I can
dish up?

japanese:
そうじゃない。
ここ数週間、無人島生活をしてただろ？
translation:
That's not it.
We've lived on a deserted island
over the past few weeks, right?

japanese:
何が起こるかわからない以上、
食料は大切にしておきたい。
translation:
As long as we didn't know what was going to happen,
I wanted to ration our food.

japanese:
だから俺は、節約ってところに長けた
らいはの食事のほうが合うと……。
translation:
That's why I think cooking a standard meal is much more
sustainable...

japanese:
なるほど。
確かに、限りある食材は
大切にしておきたいですもんね。
translation:
Right.
Yeah, we should ration our limited ingredients.

japanese:
上杉君はリーダーとして、いつも食べ物や
飲み水のことを考えてくれていましたし……。
translation:
As our leader,
Uesugi-kun always thought about
food and water for us...

japanese:
悪かった、二乃。
もう食料の心配もないわけだし、俺の失言だった。
translation:
Sorry, Nino.
We don't need to worry about food anymore,
it was just a slip of the tongue.

japanese:
いや、そもそも２人を比べる時点で失礼だったな。
らいはも、二乃も、本当にすまん。
translation:
No, it was rude of me to compare you two from the start.
Raiha, Nino, I'm really sorry.

japanese:
ううん、いいのよ。
フー君が責任感の強い人だって……よくわかったわ。
translation:
No, that's okay.
Fu-kun, I get it... You have a strong sense
of responsibility.

japanese: お兄ちゃんは言葉が足りないんだよ。
translation: Poor choice of words, big bro.

japanese:
お兄ちゃんにはお兄ちゃんなりの
考えがあるのはわかるけど、二乃さんにだって
あるんだからね？
translation:
I know you have your own way of thinking,
but so does Nino-san, you know?

japanese:
う……。
ごもっともです……。
translation:
Ooh...
You're quite right...

japanese:
らいはちゃんは優しいね。
フータローの妹とは思えない。
translation:
Raiha-chan, you're so kind.
I can't believe you're Futaro's sister.

japanese: ぐがぁ……！
translation: GAAaah!

japanese:
あ、これ、妹とは思えないって言われたのが
クリティカルヒットしましたね。
translation:
Oh, when Miku said that she can't think of Raiha-chan
being Uesugi-san's little sister, it hit him very hard!

japanese:
じゃ、これでフータロー君への
お仕置きはおしまいってことにして――
translation:
So, that means we can stop
punishing Futaro-kun for now%p-2;――

japanese:
せっかくの美味しい料理が冷めちゃうよ。
食べよう。
translation:
The delicious food will get cold.
Let's eat up guys.

japanese:
うん、お兄ちゃんは置いといて
一緒に食べよう、二乃さん。
translation:
Yep, don't worry about my big bro.
Let's eat, Nino-san.

japanese:
うん、そうね。
ありがと。
translation:
Yeah, you're right.
Thanks.

japanese:
（二乃、落ち込んでるな。
　我ながら、もうちょっと言い方ってものが……
　失敗したな……）
translation:
(Nino's really sad. I should have used different words...
 I was so rude to her...)
